scripts.fetch:wadl:bamboo-api: read -p "Bamboo Base URL: " base_url && read -p "Username: " username && curl -su ${username} -o bamboo-api/application.wadl ${base_url}/rest/api/1.0/application.wadl
scripts.fetch:wadl:bitbucket-api: read -p "Bitbucket Base URL: " base_url && read -p "Username: " username && curl -su ${username} -o bitbucket-api/application.wadl ${base_url}/rest/api/1.0/application.wadl
scripts.gen:bamboo-api: gen-tool/conv-wadl.js bamboo-api && gen-tool/fix-wadl.js bamboo-api && gen-tool/gen-api.js bamboo-api && tsc -p generated-code/bamboo-api --noEmit
scripts.gen:bitbucket-api: gen-tool/conv-wadl.js bitbucket-api && gen-tool/fix-wadl.js bitbucket-api && gen-tool/gen-api.js bitbucket-api && gen-tool/fix-bitbucket-gen.js && tsc -p generated-code/bitbucket-api --noEmit
